## BrowserFetcher.platform() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
platform(): Platform;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Platform](./puppeteer.platform.md)

Returns the current `Platform`, which is one of `mac`, `linux`, `win32` or `win64`.
